document.full_text: the nigerian army clashed with militants in the creeks of the niger delta on wednesday, the first such skirmish for months in the heartland of africa's biggest oil and gas industry.
document.title: nigerian army clashes with militants in oil delta
lines_and_colors: the nigerian army clashed with militants in the creeks of the niger delta on wednesday, the first such skirmish for months in the heartland of africa's biggest oil and gas industry.
